name: DeadPlan
description:
DeadPlan - A run-and-gun top down shooter where you absorb the power of the robots you kill. You play as pulse, a power hungry robot that enhances his body. With the energy from his foes, he gains more powers and abilities. 

WASD to move, Spacebar to select, M to mute, Mouse to aim, Left click primary fire, Right click alternate fire. 

Credits: 

  • Programming - Ben https://gamejolt.com/@FifthEdgeStudios
  • Promo Art - ray54612277 
  • Character Art - Sonhud https://twitter.com/BIT_B0Y 
  • Tile Art - Merly23 https://twitter.com/Merly233 
  • Music - Cool Kid https://soundcloud.com/coolkid720
